Title: I Married a Mind Reader
Plot: Allison gets sick and entertains herself by watching a '60s sitcom called "I Married a Mind Reader." The male star was convicted of killing his wife, the female star. Allison's dreams take her back to the '60s, which for her end up being a time of deceit, lies, and secrets.
GuestStars: Frances Fisher, Neil Vipond, Phil Abrams, Kerry Leigh Michaels, Christopher Michael, Janet Rotblatt, Paul Blackthorne
